column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The only negative is that went our group arrived (6 people) we were told by a hostess that we needed to be gone by a certain time to free up the table. The time wasn't unreasonably soon
column2: but it was kinda rude. No restaurant has ever told me that before. And people usually don't go to brunch to feel rushed through it...but I digress.
